name: Yin Yang Together
description:
Hack your brain and play two characters at the same time!

Controls: WASD and Arrow Keys

Story:

Two lovers Yin and Yang have been separated, bring them back together.

Story behind the scenes:

Stuck with a laptop and a bit of free time, I got an idea and decided to prototype it for this game jam. The inspiration for the game mechanics came from a speedrun of a game where goofy and mickey go on some kind of adventure. The speedrunner played the 2 player game alone with 2 controllers.
